queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-kubernetes-dashboard}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-kubernetes-dashboard}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{nsm-role}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{nsm-role}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{admission-webhook-role}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{admission-webhook-role}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-manager-role}}.rules[1].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-manager-role}}.rules[1].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-kubernetes-dashboard}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-kubernetes-dashboard}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{nsm-role}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{nsm-role}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-manager-role}}.rules[36].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-manager-role}}.rules[36].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-netop}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{avesha-sidecar}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-netop}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{avesha-sidecar}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory
Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=nsm-role.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=nsm-role.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=nsm-role.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=nsm-role.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

files.expected_value: metadata.name=kubeslice-manager-role.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=kubeslice-manager-role.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=kubeslice-manager-role.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=kubeslice-manager-role.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

files.expected_value: metadata.name=kubeslice-manager-role.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=kubeslice-manager-role.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=kubeslice-manager-role.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=kubeslice-manager-role.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-manager-role}}.rules[13] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-manager-role}}.rules[13] is granted read access (verbs: create, delete, get, list, patch, update, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-manager-role}}.rules[11] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubeslice-manager-role}}.rules[11] is granted read access (verbs: create, delete, get, list, patch, update, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
